document_data.name: Watchlord's Tower
document_data.mainbody: The '''Watchlord's Tower''' was a small keep in [[Thentia]] and the sea of power for the [[Watchlord]], named for the black tower that rose from it.
document_data.Location: The keep was located in the center of Thentia, halfway between the main gates and docks.
document_data.Defenses: The Tower was protected by a force of 10 veteran [[Warders (Thentia)|Warders]].
